articles.title: Paektusan Prize Int'l Figure-skating Festival Closes
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize Int'l Figure-skating Festival Closes
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The 20th Paektusan Prize International Figure-skating Festival was closed with due ceremony at the Ice Rink here on Feb. 17. The festival opened on Feb. 15 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Vice-Premier Kang Nung Su, Chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee Ryang Man Gil and officials concerned and sportspersons, citizens and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Festival prizes were awarded to figure skaters of Russia, France, the Czech Republic and the DPRK who displayed high skills.
					
					 Pak Myong Chol, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, in his closing address expressed belief that the figure skaters from different countries would significantly adorn the festival conducive to the auspicious February holiday in the future, too.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there was a demonstration performance of figure skaters of different countries and the DPRK.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Feb. 15 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Liu Yunshan, member of the Political Bureau, member of the Secretariat and head of the Publicity Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China, Zhang Yannong, president of the People's Daily, Zhang Zhijun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Liu Jieyi, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC, and others of China.
					
					 Ambassador Ji Jae Ryong and staff members of the DPRK embassy were on hand.
					
					 Ji Jae Ryong said that the Workers' Party of Korea and the army and people of the DPRK are pushing forward the general offensive to bring about a decisive turn in improving the people's standard of living and building a thriving nation, rallied close around Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Songun Korea is sure to win victory in the present advance for great surge as long as there are his wise guidance and the unbreakable single-minded unity of the soldiers and people, the ambassador stressed.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il visited China twice last year, he declared that the DPRK will strive to bring the flower garden of traditional bilateral friendship into fuller bloom this year marking the 50th anniversary of the signing of the DPRK-China Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance.
					
					 Liu Yunshan said that the Chinese people are rejoiced over the fresh successes made by the WPK and the Korean people in the drive to develop the economy, improve external relations and realize the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il is showing deep care for the development of the bilateral relations.
					
					 Liu expressed the resolution to work hard to provide a rosy future of the Sino-DPRK relations in the future, too.

articles.title: Natural Wonder Witnessed in Mt. Paektu Area
articles.content:
Natural Wonder Witnessed in Mt. Paektu Area
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- A mysterious natural wonder happened in the area of Mt. Paektu on the morning of February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 Warmer temperature than the average had persisted in this area since February 12, according to the observation by the Group for Comprehensive Exploration of Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu and the Paektusan Secret Camp Meteorological Observatory. 
					
					 At the dawn of February 16 the sky over the mountain was very bright and clear. Strong wind of over 25 meters per second blew there and the sound of ice breaking shook Lake Chon. 
					
					 At the break of the dawn the weather became windless again and the impressive sunrise over Mt. Paektu started. 
					
					 The bright sun rose up, throwing its brilliant rays and the area of the Paektusan Secret Camp turned into a fascinating picturesque of spring. 
					
					 Then rarely big and bright halo persisted in the sky above Jong Il Peak for an hour, starting at 09:30.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Il Expressed
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il Expressed
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Political parties, government ministries, organizations and institutions of different countries, international bodies and personages sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions between February 8 and 10 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They included the People's Party, FUNCINPEC Party, Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, Ministry of Defense, Ministry of the Royal Palace and the Taekwon-Do Association of Cambodia, the C.C., Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the People's Socialist Party, the Socialist Popular Party and the Socialist Party of Mexico, the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung, the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association, Chinese companies and the International Kim Il Sung Foundation.
					
					 Among them were also a senior minister, Minister of Information Khieu Kanharith and Senator Oum Mannorine of Cambodia, Coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico Alberto Anaya Gutierrez and Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Development Bank of the Mediterranean and chairman of the Italian General Investment Group.

articles.title: Congratulations from Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Congratulations from Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received congratulatory messages from organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan on the occasion of his birthday.
					They are the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers and School Clerks in Japan, the Central Standing Council of the Union of Korean Educational Association in Japan, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Scientists and Technologists Association in Japan, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, the Standing Council of the Korean Amateur Athletes Federation in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Health Workers Association in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Students Union in Japan, the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Human Rights Association in Japan and other leading organizations of Chongryon and its affiliated organizations, the Choson Sinbo Company, the Korean News Service, the Hagu Bookshop, the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe, the Kumgang Insurance Company, the Tonghae Ltd., the Korean Goods Sales Company, the Committee for Promoting Korea-Japan Economic Exchange, the Federation of Joint Economic Venture of Korean Residents in Japan, the Center for Consulting Marriage of Korean Youth in Japan, the Korean Press Hall and other businesses, local headquarters of Chongryon, Joson University and Korean schools at all levels and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 In the messages they extended greatest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Il on his birthday, carrying deep reverence of all the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Mark Birthday of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Mark Birthday of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Korean residents in Japan took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on Feb. 15 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present were Ho Jong Man, chief vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and its vice-chairmen, deputies to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, advisors of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, a permanent advisor to the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, directors of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and senior officials of leading organizations and businesses of Chongryon and others.
					
					 Ho Jong Man in his report noted that Kim Jong Il showed great loving care and trust for the officials of Chongryon and other Koreans in Japan to defend and develop the Chongryon, a precious patriotic legacy of President Kim Il Sung, and display its honor of being the model of the world overseas compatriots' movement.
					
					 He stressed the need for Chongryon to launch a 90-day campaign for glorifying this year as a year of essential and decisive turn in ushering in the fresh heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan all at once, conduct the movement for inviting Koreans to come to fold of Chongryon in real earnest and direct greater efforts to the national education, the lifeline of the movement of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Chongryon will conduct brisk external activities to make Japan settle its past in the spirit of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration and take sincere stand for the normalization of the DPRK-Japan relations, he said, adding: It will wage the vigorous reunification movement under the banner of "By our nation itself" in hearty response to the joint statement of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations.
					
					 A congratulatory message of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked in Japan
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition was sponsored by the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) in Tokyo on Feb. 15 in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Visitors saw in the front of the exhibition venue the picture showing Kim Jong Il at the platform of the military parade celebrating the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea warmly waving back to the enthusiastically cheering crowd. 
					
					 Exhibited photos included pictures on immortal leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and his noble popular traits and paternal love for the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 There were also photos showing the Taegyedo Tideland, the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm and other events of radical changes taking place in the DPRK.
					
					 Among the visitors were Ho Jong Man, chief vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, and its vice-chairmen, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, advisors and members of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, a permanent advisor to the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, officials of leading organizations and businesses of Chongryon, officials of the Kanto Headquarters of Chongryon and youth and students and other Korean residents in Japan.

articles.title: Art Performance of Koreans in Japan Given
articles.content:
Art Performance of Koreans in Japan Given
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- An art performance of Korean residents in Japan was given in Tokyo on Tuesday to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Among the audience were Ho Jong Man, chief vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and its vice-chairmen, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, advisors and members of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, a permanent advisor to the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, officials of leading organizations and businesses of Chongryon and the Kanto Headquarters of Chongryon and youth and students and other Korean residents in Japan.
					
					 Its numbers included "The Mind Following the General" and "Silk-producing Girl".
					
					 In choruses "Road to Victory" and "We Are New Generation of Chongryon" and chorus and dance "Arirang of Prosperity of Chongryon" the performers well represented the will of the Koreans in Japan to remain true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il and reliably carry forward the tradition of patriotism.

articles.title: Russian Newspapers Celebrate Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Russian Newspapers Celebrate Kim Jong Il's Birthday
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers gave special write-ups to the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The 2nd issue of Raboche-Krestiyanskaya Pravda carried an article titled "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea" together with a portrait of the leader.
					
					 The article said that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the DPRK is confidently advancing toward a thriving nation despite all ordeals and challenges.
					
					 The course of building socialism in the DPRK proves that even a small country can defend its dignity and develop when it relies on its own strength, it said.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is leading to victory the general offensive for the improvement of the people's living standard while shattering the imperialists' anti-DPRK moves with his iron will, matchless grit and ever-changing tactics, it noted.
					
					 The 2nd issue of Serp I Molot carried a photo of the leader acknowledging the cheering crowd. It also carried an article praising the feats he performed to turn the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The Feb. 8 issue of Selskaya Zhizn carried an article introducing Kimjongilia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries between Jan. 29 and Feb. 5 in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a meeting and a film show in Switzerland and Brazil a film show and a photo exhibition in Nigeria.
					
					 The secretary of a Communist Party of Switzerland said at the meeting: It is entirely thanks to the wise Songun policy of leader Kim Jong Il that the DPRK has dynamically advanced the socialist cause despite all sorts of trials for the past decades.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would register greater success in the efforts to defend the sovereignty of the country from the U.S. imperialists' moves for stifling it and build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Our Party will intensify the activities of support and solidarity with the just struggle of the Korean people, he said.
					
					 The director of the Association for Regional Development under the Western Regional City Federation in Santa Catarina of Brazil said that they extend full support to the Korean people in their efforts to build a rich and powerful country and reunify the divided Korean Peninsula. We will strive to develop the cultural exchange and cooperation between the two countries, he added.

articles.title: Korean Films Shown in Different Countries
articles.content:
Korean Films Shown in Different Countries
						
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows took place in France, Malaysia and Nigeria between Feb. 3 and 9 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Films shown included "Arms of Korea" and "The Country Shining with Arms of Mt. Paektu".
					
					 The general secretary of the C.C., the French Revolutionary Communist League reaffirmed support and solidarity with the just struggle of the Korean people wisely led by Kim Jong Il. This instills the conviction of victory into the world progressives struggling against imperialism, he said.
					
					 Speakers at the film shows in Nigeria stressed that the rapid development in economy, culture and other fields of the DPRK is a striking demonstration of the Korean people's close unity around Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Gambian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Gambian President 
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh, President of Gambia, on Feb. 15 on the 46th anniversary of its independence.
					 In the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, Kim in the message wished the president and people of Gambia greater success in their work for national unity and economic development of the country.

articles.title: Hu Jintao on Boosting China-DPRK Relations
articles.content:
Hu Jintao on Boosting China-DPRK Relations
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The Chinese party and government are satisfied with the successful development of the bilateral relations. It is the steadfast policy of the Chinese party and government to attach high importance to the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations and steadily develop them.
					 Hu Jintao, president of the People's Republic of China, said this on Feb. 14 when he received credentials from Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China.
					
					 China and Korea are friendly neighbors sharing mountain and rivers and the two peoples have long and deep relations, Hu said. The traditional Sino-DPRK friendship, provided and fostered by the leaders of the elder generation, is steadily developing in the new century, too, he added.
					
					Recalling that General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited China twice last year, Hu said: I had unions with Kim Jong Il twice a year, and we reached an in-depth consensus of views on important issues.
					
					 This put great spurs to the development of the bilateral relations, he said, adding:
					
					 Recently the economic and trade relations have developed and visits and exchange and cooperation in different fields made brisk headway between the two countries, and they are deepening mutual understanding in major international issues.
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's efforts to develop the economy and improve the people's standard of living.
					
					 The Chinese side will deepen the strategic mutual understanding with the DPRK side and steadily develop the traditional Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations, thus defending the regional peace and stability and promoting the common development.

articles.title: Korean Folk Dishes Taken on Jan. 15th of Lunar Year
articles.content:
Korean Folk Dishes Taken on Jan. 15th of Lunar Year
						
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Koreans enjoy Thursday, the 15th of January in lunar calendar, as folk holiday.
					 On the occasion of this day, public catering centers in the DPRK serve traditional dishes, including boiled rice mixed with four other staple cereals, glutinous rice mixed with sugar, dates, chestnuts, pine-nuts, sesame oil, etc, dishes cooked with nine kinds of dried herbs and taffy.
					
					 Boiled rice mixed with four other staple cereals and glutinous boiled rice are peculiar in taste and highly nutritious.
					
					 The Korean people used to eat dishes cooked with dried greens on the 15th January in lunar calendar, believing that they are very effective in standing summer heat and preventing any diseases.
					
					 They also like to have several kinds of taffies made with sesame, pine-nuts, walnuts, chestnuts, dates, etc. 
					
					 These sweet dishes are very popular among not only children but also adults.

articles.title: Koreans Enjoy Folk Holiday
articles.content:
Koreans Enjoy Folk Holiday 
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Today is the 15th of January in lunar calendar, folk holiday of the Koreans.
					After significantly celebrating the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, working people and school youth and children in the DPRK enjoyed this folk holiday.
					
					 As unit of family or neighbors, they merrily spent this day, having boiled rice made of five grains, dishes cooked with nine dried herbs and other traditional dishes and playing folk amusement games such as Korean chess and Yut game. 
					
					 Catering centers across the country, including the Okryu Restaurant and the Chongryu Restaurant in Pyongyang and restaurants in the folk street of North Hwanghae Province, served such foods as noodle with pheasant meat, Pyongyang cold noodle, meal with five grains, sweet rice dish and mung-bean pancake. 
					
					 People were seen to enjoy the first full moon on Moran Hill and the bank of the River Taedong in Pyongyang, at the Inphung Pavilion in Kanggye of Jagang Province and other places across the country.

articles.title: Performance of Star Figure-skaters
articles.content:
Performance of Star Figure-skaters
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Star figure-skaters of different countries contributed to significantly decorating the 20th Paektusan Prize International Figure-skating Festival with their refined skills and high artistic representation. 
					 Among them was Evgeny Plyushchenko of Russia, 29, who won in World Figure Skating Championships and European Figure Skating Championships several times. He successfully carried out jump turn and other high-technique movements on the basis of rich experience to fully show his skills as a world champion. 
					
					 Tomas Verner, 25, of the Czech Republic, and Surya Varuna Claudine Bonaly, 38, of France, both winners of European Figure Skating Championships, smoothly carried out difficult movements to be acclaimed by the audience. 
					
					 Nathalie Gabrielle Pechalat, 28, and Fabian Bourzat, 31, a pair of France, showed beautiful rhythms and artistic representation in unity of action to the light music. They are well known in the world ice dancing circle.
					
					 Kim Un Ha, 24, who won gold medals in international tournaments, and Ri Song Chol, 25, of the DPRK touched the hearts of the audience with brisk and graceful movements. 
					
					 Ri Chol Un, 39, of the Ice Association of the DPRK, said that the festival delighted the Korean people greeting the greatest national holiday.

articles.title: S. Korea Blamed for Failed Inter-Korean Talks
articles.content:
S. Korea Blamed for Failed Inter-Korean Talks
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are busy shifting the blame for the failed inter-Korean  talks on to the DPRK, but they can never hide their true colors as the breaker of dialogue, says Minju Joson, a major newspaper of the DPRK.
					 The blame for the ruptured preliminary talks for the opening of the north-south high-level military talks arranged with much effort is entirely on south Korea which took wrong attitude towards dialogue, the newspaper says in a bylined commentary Thursday, adding:
					
					 The puppet war-like forces of south Korea staged anti-DPRK war exercises from the day after the DPRK announced its important proposal calling for holding wide-ranging dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 Meanwhile, they were busy with cooperation with foreign forces to hurt and stifle the fellow countrymen in the north calling for dialogue and negotiations intended to tide over the crisis on the Korean Peninsula and between the north and the south.
					
					 In actuality, they laid an artificial obstacle in the way of talks under the unreasonable conditions and pretext at the talks on Feb. 8. They went the lengths of converting the venue of the talks into that of confrontation, insisting that their unilateral proposals be adopted as agenda items of the talks.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are misleading the public opinion to create impression that the DPRK is to blame for the recently ruptured talks. Lurking behind it is their black-hearted intention to avoid criticism by the public opinion at home and abroad through distortion of the facts and escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen in collusion with foreign forces and thus realize their scheme at any cost.
					
					 The history will surely punish the south Korean authorities for having brought to collapse the north-south dialogue for defusing the tension and opening a new phase for peace and reunification and chilled the desire of all the fellow countrymen in a bid to attain their sinister aims.

articles.title: Projected War Exercises Opposed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Projected War Exercises Opposed in S. Korea
						
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations in Seoul held a press conference in Seoul on Monday denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warlike forces for their scheme to stage joint military exercises for aggression on the DPRK.
					 The organizations said that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises would further aggravate the tension of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The projected war gambles, larger in scale than those of last year and aimed to "remove the north's nuclear and other weapons of mass destruction," are evidently ones against the north, they charged.
					
					 They strongly demanded a prompt halt to these dangerous drills which will increase the war crisis on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The authorities should come out for dialogue and cooperation, not confrontation and war, as demanded by the people, they urged.
					
					 They declared that they go on an action in demand of stop to the war maneuvers and peace of the peninsula through unconditioned south-north dialogue.

articles.title: Damage by Heavy Snowfall Grows in S. Korea
articles.content:
Damage by Heavy Snowfall Grows in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Damage by heavy snowfall in the east coastal area of south Korea is increasing, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 At least 460 villages of vinyl houses collapsed and crops in the cultivated area of over 9 hectares were damaged in south Korean Kangwon Province and North Kyongsang Province as of Feb. 14.
					
					 Shoals of fish died at fish breeding farms and 27 fishing ships were sunk.
					
					 The amount of damage was reported to total to 13.4 billion won.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Guinea
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house of Guinea.
					 The work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), serves as an immortal great program of party building and activities. The work reviews with high pride the glorious history of the WPK, which paved a new road for building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung. It also indicates the way for strengthening the WPK into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 A ceremony of releasing the work took place at the publishing house on February 10.

articles.title: Se ofrece banquete por 69o cumpleanos de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Se ofrece banquete por 69o cumpleanos de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 69o aniversario de nacimiento del Dirigente   Kim Jong Il, el Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecieron un banquete ayer por la noche.
					  Cuando aparecio en el salon de recepcion el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del PTC, Presidente del CDN de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los participantes le acogieron hospitalariamente rindiendole el maximo honor y el mas calido agradecimiento en representacion de la ilimitada veneracion y confianza de todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el pueblo.
					
					  El Dirigente respondio cordialmente a las aclamaciones de los participantes y felicito calidamente a ellos que luchan abnegadamente por defender el pais y lograr la prosperidad de la patria socialista bajo la direccion del partido.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, Kim Jong Un, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk, Kim Chang Sop, los miembros de la CMC del PTC, Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Won Hong, Jong Myong Do, Yun Jong Rin y los jefes de departamento del CDN, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.
					
					  El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC.
					
					  Los participantes brindaron por la salud del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien garantiza las victorias y el destino del pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Hu Jintao ratifica la posicion de desarrollar relaciones con Corea
articles.content:
Hu Jintao ratifica la posicion de desarrollar relaciones con Corea
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ATCC) -- El presidente de la Republica Popular China, Hu Jintao, recibio el dia 14 las cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de Corea en ese pais, Ji Jae Ryong.
					  En la ocasion el mandatario chino reitero que China y Corea son vecinos amistosos con montes y rios colindantes y los pueblos de ambos paises mantienen largas y profundas relaciones.
					
					  Prosiguio que la tradicional amistad China-Corea, forjada y desarrollada por los lideres de veterana generacion, sigue consolidandose en el nuevo siglo tambien.
					
					  Recordo las dos visitas a China del Dirigente    Kim Jong Il realizadas el ano pasado y anadio que se ha reunido con el dos veces en un ano y logro un consenso amplio en los importantes asuntos abordados.
					
					  Esto estimulo fuertemente el desarrollo de las relaciones entre ambos paises, subrayo y continuo:
					
					  Ultimamente, entre ambos paises se desarrollan las relaciones economicas y comerciales, se dinamizan las visitas, el intercambio y la cooperacion en varios dominios y se llega a la comprension mutua en los importantes problemas internacionales.
					
					  El partido y el gobierno de China estan complacidos del magnifico desarrollo de relaciones bilaterales y se mantienen en su invariable orientacion de apreciar al maximo y consolidar constantemente esos lazos de amistad y cooperacion.
					
					  Apoyamos activamente los esfuerzos de Corea por desarrollar la economia y mejorar las condiciones de la vida del pueblo.
					
					  La parte china defendera la paz y la estabilidad de la region y promovera el desarrollo comun al intensificar el intercambio de opiniones estrategicas con la parte coreana y desarrollar sin parar las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion China-Corea.

articles.title: Embajada coreana en China ofrece banquete por el 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Embajada coreana en China ofrece banquete por el 16 de febrero 
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la embajada coreana en China ofrecio el 15 una recepcion.
					Fueron invitados Liu Yunshan, miembro del Buro Politico y del Secretariado y jefe del Departamento de Propaganda del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Zhang Yannong, director del diario Renmin Ribao, Zhang Zhijun, viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Liu Jieyi, subjefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, y otros.
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes el embajador Ji Jae Ryong y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica coreana.
					
					En su discurso pronunciado en la ocasion, el embajador coreano senalo que el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea aceleran la ofensiva general por producir un cambio decisivo en el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo y la construccion de la gran potencia prospera uniendose firmemente en torno al Dirigente.
					
					Puntualizo que mientras cuente con la sabia guia del Dirigente y la invencible unidad monolitica de todo el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos, la Corea del Songun saldra victoriosa sin falta de la marcha de hoy por el gran auge.
					
					Recordo las 2 visitas a China realizadas por el Dirigente en el ano pasado y ratifico la voluntad de esforzarse mas activamente por desarrollar la tradicional amistad bilateral en este ano del 50o aniversario de la firma del tratado Corea-China sobre la amistad, la cooperacion y la ayuda mutua.
					
					Liu Yunshan recalco que el pueblo chino se alegra mucho de los nuevos exitos que logran el PTC y el pueblo coreano en su lucha por desarrollar la economia, mejorar las relaciones exteriores y realizar la reunificacion independiente y pacifica bajo la direccion del Secretario General Kim Jong Il.
					
					Continuo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presta mucha atencion al desarrollo de las relaciones entre dos paises.
					
					Por ultimo, manifesto la decision de seguir esforzandose ingentemente por forjar el futuro maravilloso de las relaciones entre ambos paises.

articles.title: En varios paises envian cestos de flores a embajadas coreanas
articles.content:
En varios paises envian cestos de flores a embajadas coreanas
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, fueron enviados del dia 8 al 10 los cestos de flores a las representaciones coreanas.
					Entre los remitentes figuran el Partido de Pueblo de Camboya, el Frente Unido Nacional para Camboya Independiente, Neutral, Pacifica y Cooperativa, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y Cooperacion Internacional, el Ministerio de Defensa, el Ministerio de Palacio Real y la Asociacion de Taekwondo, de Camboya; el Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Gran Bretana (Marxista-Leninista); el Partido Socialista del Pueblo, el Partido Popular Socialista, el Partido Socialista, de Mexico, el Comite Mexicano de Estudio del Kimilsunismo, el Instituto de la Idea Juche de Mexico, el Comite de Coordinacion Nacional de Mexico para el Estudio de la Idea Juche, la Union de Amigos Mexicanos en Memoria del Presidente     Kim Il Sung, el Comite Mexicano de Apoyo a la Reunificacion de Corea, la Asociacion de Amistad Mexico-Corea; varias companias de China; la Fundacion Internacional Kim Il Sung.
					
					Lo hicieron tambien el ministro de Estado, el ministro de Informacion, el senador Oun Mannorine, de Camboya; el coordinador del Comite de Coordinacion Nacional del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico, Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, y Giancarlo Elia Valori, presidente de la Central de Desarrollo del Mediterraneo y de la Central Financiera General de Italia.

articles.title: Estrellas del XX Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico
articles.content:
Estrellas del XX Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ATCC) -- Las estrellas de varios paises brillaron tambien en el XX Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico por el Premio Paektusan.
					La actuacion mas impresionante fue mostrada por el ruso Evgeny Plyushchenko (de 29 anos) quien ocupo varias veces el primer lugar en el Campeonato Mundial de Patinaje Artistico y el Campeonato Europeo de Patinaje Artistico.
					
					Haciendo uso de sus ricas experiencias, el cumplio perfectamente varios movimientos, que requieren de mucha habilidad, como giro en suspension.
					
					El checo Tomas Verner (25 anos) y la francesa Surya Varuna Claudine Bonaly (38 anos), campeones europeos, arrancaron la efusiva ovacion del publico con sus movimientos de dificil cumplimiento.
					
					La francesa Nathalie Gabrielle Pechalat (28 anos) y su compatriota Fabian Bourzat (31 anos) son figuras ampliamente conocidas en el circulo mundial de patinaje artistico.
					
					Esta pareja demostraron hermosos movimientos y magnifica interpretacion artistica sincronizando sus pasos al son de una musica ligera.
					
					Kim Un Ha (muchacha de 24 anos) y Ri Song Chol (muchacho de 25 anos), quienes ganaron medallas de oro en varias competencias internacionales, y otros jugadores anfitriones dejaron muy conmovidos a los espectadores.
					
					Ri Chol Un (hombre de 39 anos) de la Asociacion Coreana de Patinaje sobre el Hielo dijo a la ATCC que en el presente festival participaron las estrellas de talla mundial que pusieron mas alegre al pueblo coreano que celebra la fiesta nacional mas grande.

articles.title: Platos tradicionales del 15 de enero lunar
articles.content:
Platos tradicionales del 15 de enero lunar
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ATCC) -- Hoy es el 15 de enero segun el calendario lunar, fiesta folclorica de Corea.
					  Este dia, las redes gastronomicas de todas partes del pais expenden los platos, que deben probar sin falta, tales como el arroz cocido con 5 cereales, Yakbap, 9 hierbas comestibles cocinadas, la melaza.
					
					  Especialmente el arroz de 5 cereales y Yakbap (arroz glutinoso cocido y condimentado con azucar, datil, castana, pinon y aceite de sesamo) son alimentos saludables de sabor singular y alto valor nutritivo.
					
					  Los coreanos creen que las hierbas comestibles, que consumen este dia, permiten protegerse del calor asfixiante de verano y de las enfermedades.
					
					  La maleza se hace con el sesamo, el pinon, la nuez, la castana, la azufaifa, etc.
					
					Este dulce les gusta mucho no solo a los ninos sino tambien a los adultos.
